reason: COMPUTATIONAL VERIFICATION NOT SHOWN: While the statement asserts h_1(1) = 6, h_1(4) = 3, h_1(3) = 1, h_1(6) = 4, these are presented as facts without showing the computational trace. A fully rigorous proof would show: Under cycle (1 6 4 3), element 1 maps to the element immediately following it in the cycle, which is 6. Element 6 maps to 4. Element 4 maps to 3. Element 3 maps to 1 (wrapping). Each step should reference the cycle definition being used.
